text: Harold Hylton (born 1960) is a retired British boxer. ==Boxing career== He represented England and won a silver medal in the 91 kg heavyweight division, at the 1982 Commonwealth Games in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. Hylton boxed for the Brockworth Viking ABC and was twice the ABA heavyweight champion in 1982 and 1985. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:British male boxers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in boxing Category:Boxers at the 1982 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Heavyweight boxers
title: Harold Hylton
